<IntegrationDetailCard :title="`Send account credential information to ${$localeConfig.brandName} for authentication`">
<ApiMethodSpec method="post" host="https://<your applicaion domain name>.authing.cn" path="/oidc/token" summary="Use login credentials to exchange token" description="In Password mode, you can directly use the user's login credentials in exchange for OIDC token">
<template slot="bodyParams">
<ApiMethodParam name="scope" type="string" description="
Authorization range, a string, openid is required, optional values are profile email address phone offline_access. Use spaces to separate different values. profile is the user's basic information, email is the user's mailbox, address is the user's address, phone is the user's mobile phone number, offline_access will return refresh_token, which is used to refresh the OIDC Token later. The default is openid profile." />
<ApiMethodParam name="client_id" type="string" required description="Applicaion ID" />
<ApiMethodParam name="client_secret" type="string" required description="Applicaion Secret。" />
<ApiMethodParam name="grant_type" type="string" required>

Must fill `password`。

</ApiMethodParam>
<ApiMethodParam name="username" type="string" description="Username, mutually exclusive with email and mobile phone number." />
<ApiMethodParam name="phone" type="string" description="Mobile phone number, mutually exclusive with email and username." />
<ApiMethodParam name="email" type="string" description="Email，mutually exclusive with username and mobile phone number." />
<ApiMethodParam name="password" type="string" required description="Password" />
<ApiMethodParam name="password_encrypt_type" type="string">

Password encryption type (optional). Supports encryption using `RSA256` and the Chinese national `SM2` algorithms. By default, set to `none`, meaning no encryption.

- `none`: Does not encrypt the password; the password is transmitted in plaintext.
- `rsa`: Encrypts the password using the RSA256 algorithm. You need to use the RSA public key provided by the Authing service for encryption. Please refer to the [Password Secure Transmission - RSA256](https://api-explorer.authing.cn/?tag=group/%E5%BC%80%E5%8F%91%E5%87%86%E5%A4%87#tag/%E5%BC%80%E5%8F%91%E5%87%86%E5%A4%87/%E5%AF%86%E7%A0%81%E5%AE%89%E5%85%A8%E4%BC%A0%E8%BE%93/RSA256) section to learn how to obtain the RSA256 public key from the Authing service.
- `sm2`: Encrypts the password using the Chinese national SM2 algorithm. You need to use the SM2 public key provided by the Authing service for encryption. Please refer to the [Password Secure Transmission - SM2](https://api-explorer.authing.cn/?tag=group/%E5%BC%80%E5%8F%91%E5%87%86%E5%A4%87#tag/%E5%BC%80%E5%8F%91%E5%87%86%E5%A4%87/%E5%AF%86%E7%A0%81%E5%AE%89%E5%85%A8%E4%BC%A0%E8%BE%93/%E5%9B%BD%E5%AF%86%20SM2) section to learn how to obtain the SM2 public key from the Authing service.

</ApiMethodParam>
</template>
<template slot="response">
<ApiMethodResponse description="User login credentials are correct, return OIDC related Token.">

```json
{
  "access_token": "eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCIsImtpZCI6IlJJQ015UV9yVFFESlZGYkJEclBDdml0ME9LczBSNWNRX3N1Vmt4alRmOUkifQ..Tk4npueRIyJPVxrfiOVQgMKEbk4z_KOvOkOGNyVKyeMtSHEcvU8tMRhjBP_ZrISaT4XO-vu_O1tDUBFhCKMDXWnPMwNotbbcRwRdmzueoe1G0YyxHvcuNihAFyfT_99Skaq3TuG7EzeeFuuvkUejFKRmaODraQY1vQrJl_0WNX1f6NZVYNUcOTCslb_R6qNodFQvjfOJv73FyArETKRAKN5sdTtUWuwxf9QfNm5jwJ_iratqSb5GYU-hd6U-47JKzqv_NEEVrGcRSDrW4ICrulOVPduKOwUqwg7VjHqpvAk2cIt5UdgSh2aaj3KpBhRWm2Exp2AY62sP-oLU3qigBQ",
  "id_token": "eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCIsImtpZCI6IlJJQ015UV9yVFFESlZGYkJEclBDdml0ME9LczBSNWNRX3N1Vmt4alRmOUkifQ..XUOWiKi0mpkcw570rCBZVz0wHWz1gBi5N5Bgz8mqU08FA2dlFradoZ9m_pZYlZPHW6A9R54rI7MzONQlt-sDjGqxLkL6wSNrYIJuYlysRldK3E1NRmziVukMQn8jkyq1DLhKK3WzX_ODbkasHTxdFmJ6iAgouuTjdCdcGv1B1ZTXIKJoIgXwMnYjrWbDULkJg_5_o7eP1GCVG8l5UgIRy5YNunEg7nEVLAu0aj-ob613x5k7ceb-jYLjCX2_9PVIEDeE5exGbz-3txhAxn77xjTi7m1-NEhusTHhd_p315fs0ziCYCaXXsO9eRlJ7I78geP87Thq3-vgQH7YgNy8tA",
  "refresh_token": "vRZXKWcvyVE9_kKq26OD2gFyame",
  "expires_in": 3600,
  "token_type": "Bearer",
  "scope": "openid profile email phone offline_access"
}
```

</ApiMethodResponse>
<ApiMethodResponse httpCode="400" description="The user login credentials are incorrect, and an error message is returned.">

```js
{
    error: 'invalid_grant',
    error_description: 'invalid credentials provided',
}
```

</ApiMethodResponse>
</template>
</ApiMethodSpec>

::: hint-warning
**User ID field**「email、phone、username」are **mutually exclusive**，You **cannot pass in** any combination of two or more of these parameters at the same time.
:::

**Reference**

1. [Scope and user information correspondence table](oidc-params.md#scope-参数对应的用户信息)
2. [When to use Password mode？「Video」](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qMtYaDmhnHU)
3. [Password mode is only for forward compatibility「Video」](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zuVuhl_Axbs)

</IntegrationDetailCard>
